meanings.definition: A decorative cloth or panel placed at the front of an altar.
meanings.sent1: The antependia on the altar was beautifully embroidered with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest carefully adjusted the antependia to ensure it was perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the antependia, thinking it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The antependia seemed to glow in the dim candlelight, adding a mystical aura to the altar.
meanings.sent5: Visitors to the church were mesmerized by the intricate design of the antependia.

meanings.sent1: The church displayed various antependia, each with its unique design and color scheme.
meanings.sent2: The antependia were carefully stored in a special cabinet when not in use.
meanings.sent3: The antependia decided to have a meeting to discuss their roles in the church.
meanings.sent4: The collection of antependia in the church symbolized the diversity of the congregation.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering antependia caught the sunlight, creating a dazzling display for the worshippers.
